name: The Well of the Past
description:
Get ready to embark on an interactive adventure, in which an old tale is waiting for you to be lived again. The game is playable in english and in french.

It's our entry for LDJam 46.  Hope you'll enjoy it!

Tools used :

  • Godot Engine
  • MyPaint
  • Audacity
  • Gimp

Musical instruments used : Nanoloop mono on Gameboy, Korg Volca FM, Aodyo Sylphyo, Yamaha PSS-470 and a bunch of guitar pedals recorded on a good old Yamaha MD-8.
